name: filezilla
title: FileZilla
description: Connect to the FTP/SFTP server via FileZilla by just using your keyboard!
author: naqet

commands.name: list-saved-servers
commands.title: List Saved Servers
commands.description: Opens FileZilla with chosen server connected.

commands.name: show-latest-connections
commands.title: Show Latest Connections
commands.description: Opens FileZilla with one of the last servers connected.

commands.name: open-site-manager
commands.title: Open Site Manager
commands.description: Opens site manager in FileZilla, where you can add, delete and edit saved servers.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
